parameters.name: CheckItemFuzzy
parameters.description: The name of the check item. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: RecordIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the whitelist rules.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The data source. If you leave this parameter empty, the default value is used. Valid values:

*   **default**: server
*   **agentless**: agentless detection
